msgSnippet: Hi Robert, I didnt ask you to do R&D for me. I just told my situation. Anyway thanks for your kind reply

Hi Robert,

	I didnt ask you to do R&D for me. I just told my situation. Anyway
thanks for your kind reply


> -----Original Message-----
> From:	Robert Leftwich [SMTP:digital@...]
> Sent:	Monday, June 18, 2001 11:11 AM
> To:	junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject:	Re: [junit] regarding Servlet TestCases
> 
> At 15:04 18/06/01, Pendyala Lakshmana wrote:
> >Hi,
> >
> >         We are in hurry to write TestCases for Servlets . We have no
> time to
> >do R&D. So, Anybody can send the clear procedure to write Servlet
> TestCases
> >?
> 
> Sorry, I (and anyone else for that matter) have no time to do your R&D for
> you!
> 
> But I suggest you go to the Cactus website 
> (http://jakarta.apache.org/commons/cactus/index.html) and learn how to use
> 
> it - it has a quite good introduction to writing servlet test cases 
> (http://jakarta.apache.org/commons/cactus/using.html).
> 
> Robert
>

subject: RE: [junit] regarding Servlet TestCases
